title: Best Strawberry Daiquiri
description: These are the perfect strawberry daiquiris for a hot summer day. Made with fresh or frozen strawberries, these are so good you'll never buy a mix again.
directions: Step1: Place frozen strawberries in a blender; add sugar, lemon juice, and lime juice. Pour in rum and lemon-lime beverage, then add ice. Blend until smooth.
ingredients: 4 ounces frozen strawberries, 0.5 cup white sugar, 0.5 cup lemon juice, 0.125 cup lime juice, 0.75 cup rum, 0.25 cup lemon-lime flavored carbonated beverage, 6 cups ice, or as needed

title: Oolong, Orange, and Whiskey Punch
description: Balanced with orange and a light touch of spice, this punch is whiskey-forward without being overpowering.
directions: Step1: Bring water to a boil in a saucepan over high heat. Stir in sugar, cinnamon stick, and star anise. Remove from heat and add tea bags. Let steep for 3 minutes (or according to package directions for strongest tea). Remove tea bags. Let cool to room temperature, about 1 hour. Remove and discard cinnamon stick and star anise. Step2: Stir together tea mixture, orange juice, whiskey, and lemon juice in a punch bowl or pitcher. Chill until cold, about 2 hours or up to overnight. Step3: Garnish with tangerine slices and additional star anise. Ladle into ice-filled glasses. Top each with a tangerine slice.
ingredients: 3 cups water, 3 tablespoons sugar, 1 (2 inch) cinnamon stick, 2 whole star anise, 6 oolong tea bags, 2.66 cups fresh orange juice, 1.5 cups whiskey, 3 tablespoons fresh lemon juice (from 1 lemon), large ice cubes, tangerine, sectioned and seeded

title: Grasshopper Cocktail
description: This retro grasshopper drink is like an after-dinner mint in a glass. Enjoy this delicious chocolatey cocktail classic with, or instead of, dessert.
directions: Step1: Combine creme de menthe, creme de cacao, cream, and ice in a cocktail shaker. Cover and shake until chilled. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
ingredients: 0.75 fluid ounce creme de menthe, 0.75 fluid ounce white creme de cacao, 0.25 fluid ounce heavy cream, 1 cup ice

title: Oyster Shooters
description: An oyster shooter is a spicy cocktail made with a shucked oyster, tomato juice, horseradish, pepper, and vodka for a refreshing way to enjoy oysters!
directions: Step1: Mix tomato juice, horseradish, and pepper in a large bowl until well combined. Step2: Pour 1/2 shot of tomato juice mixture into 12 small glasses. Add a shot of vodka to each glass. Place 1 raw oyster in each glass and garnish with a lemon wedge.
ingredients: 9 fluid ounces tomato juice, 1 teaspoon prepared horseradish, 2 teaspoons freshly ground black pepper, 12 (1.5 fluid ounce) jiggers vodka, 12 shucked oysters, 1 lemon - cut into wedges, for garnish

title: Homemade Hot Apple Cider
description: Nothing beats this apple cider recipe. Enjoy a hot mug of fresh apple cider sweetened with pure maple syrup for a perfect treat on a cold winter day.
directions: Step1: Pour apple cider and maple syrup into a large stainless steel saucepan. Step2: Place cinnamon sticks, cloves, allspice berries, orange peel, and lemon peel in the center of a square of washed cheesecloth; fold up the sides of the cheesecloth to enclose the bundle, then tie it up with a length of kitchen string. Drop the spice bundle into the cider mixture. Step3: Place the saucepan over moderate heat for 5 to 10 minutes, or until cider is very hot but not boiling. Step4: Remove cider from the heat. Discard the spice bundle. Step5: Ladle cider into big cups or mugs, adding a fresh cinnamon stick to each serving if desired.
ingredients: 6 cups apple cider, 0.25 cup real maple syrup, 2 cinnamon sticks, 6 whole cloves, 6 whole allspice berries, 1 orange peel, cut into strips, 1 lemon peel, cut into strips

title: Cosmopolitan Cocktail
description: This is a classic cosmopolitan cocktail, or 'cosmo', made with vodka, orange liqueur, lime, and a splash of cranberry juice for that touch of pink.
directions: Step1: Gather all ingredients. Step2: Combine vodka, lime juice, triple sec, and cranberry juice in a cocktail shaker. Step3: Add ice, cover and shake until chilled. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Step4: Garnish with a lime wedge.
ingredients: 1.5 fluid ounces vodka, 0.25 fluid ounce lime juice, 0.25 fluid ounce triple sec, 0.25 fluid ounce cranberry juice, 1 cup ice, 1 lime wedge for garnish

title: Big-Batch Pineapple-Basil Vodka Sours
description: Channel your inner mixologist with infused vodka and homemade sour mix, then shake them together for a sweet-tart sipper you can call your own.
directions: Step1: For pineapple-basil vodka, put pineapple in a 1-quart jar. Top with vodka, cover, and let stand until vodka is infused with pineapple flavor, 1 to 3 days. Add basil, cover, and infuse for 1 to 2 hours; strain.   Meanwhile for the DIY sour mix, combine sugar and water in a saucepan and bring to a boil over high heat, stirring until sugar is dissolved. Remove from heat; let cool. Add lime juice and lemon juice. Chill in the refrigerator for at least 1 hour and up to 1 week. Step2: In a pitcher, stir together pineapple-basil vodka and DIY sour mix. Serve in rocks glasses over ice. Top with club soda (if using); garnish with pineapple wedges, fronds, and additional basil.
ingredients: Pineapple-Basil Vodka, 11/2 cups chopped fresh pineapple, 1 (750-ml) bottle vodka, 1/2 cup fresh basil leaves, plus more forgarnish, DIY Sour Mix, 1 cup sugar, 1 cup water, 1 cup freshly squeezed lime juice (about 8limes), 1 cup freshly squeezed lemon juice (about 6lemons), Additional, Ice, Club soda (optional), Fresh pineapple wedges and fronds, for garnish

title: Copycat Wendy’s Chocolate Frosty
description: Wendy’s Frosty fans, look no further. We tried a viral DIY version of the frozen favorite, and it’s well worth giving a spin—no ice cream machine needed.
directions: Step1: Pour chocolate milk into ice cube trays and freeze until solid, at least 4 hours and up to 24.   Process frozen milk cubes, frozen whipped topping, whole milk, and sweetened condensed milk in a food processor until smooth. Serve immediately or freeze in an airtight container up to 1 week.
ingredients: 2 cups chocolate milk, 1 cup frozen whipped topping (do not thaw), 1/4 cup whole milk, 1 tablespoon sweetened condensed milk

title: Mai Tai
description: This Mai Tai cocktail blends two rums, coconut and spiced, with pineapple juice, orange juice, and grenadine to make a tropical, fruity party drink.
directions: Step1: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Step2: Add pineapple juice, orange juice, spiced rum, coconut rum, and grenadine. Shake vigorously and strain into a glass full of ice.
ingredients: 1 cup ice cubes, 3 fluid ounces pineapple juice, 2 fluid ounces orange juice, 1 (1.5 fluid ounce) jigger spiced rum, 0.5 (1.5 fluid ounce) jigger coconut-flavored rum, 1 teaspoon grenadine syrup

title: Ginger-Hibiscus Sparkler
description: Spicy ginger liqueur, nonalcoholic ginger beer, and sweet-tart hibiscus provide all the buzz you need.
directions: Step1: Steep hibiscus flowers in boiling water for 5 minutes; strain into a heatproof bowl set in a bowl of ice to speed cooling. Cool completely. Step2: Transfer to a small pitcher. Stir in lime juice and ginger liqueur. Pour into ice-filled Collins glasses (about 5 oz. per glass) and top each with 1 oz. ginger beer. Garnish with mint sprigs and ginger slices.
ingredients: 0.25 cup dried hibiscus petals, 1.5 cups boiling water, 0.5 cup fresh lime juice, 0.5 cup ginger liqueur (such as Domaine de Canton®), 0.5 cup ginger beer, 4 sprigs fresh mint for garnish, fresh ginger, peeled and thinly sliced

title: Stout and Ale
description: This black and tan recipe is called a "half and half" in Ireland. A pint glass is filled halfway with lager on the bottom with a float of Guinness on top.
directions: Step1: Divide lager beer evenly between 2 tall beer glasses. Step2: Working with one glass at a time, place a large tablespoon, dome-side up, 1 inch or so above lager beer, with the tip of the spoon pointed slightly downward. Step3: Slowly pour 1/2 of the stout beer over the tablespoon so it gently pours down the side of the glass in a thick trickle. Allow to stand until 2 distinct layers of beer form, 3 to 5 seconds. Repeat with the remaining glass of beer.
ingredients: 1 (12 fluid ounce) bottle lager beer (such as Harp®), 1 (12 fluid ounce) can or bottle Irish stout beer (such as Guinness®)

title: Tom Collins Cocktail
description: This Tom Collins recipe makes a classic gin cocktail that's tart thanks to lemon, sweet thanks to simple syrup, and fizzy thanks to club soda.
directions: Step1: Fill a Collins glass with 1 1/2 cups ice; set aside in the freezer. Step2: Combine gin, lemon juice, and simple syrup in a cocktail shaker. Add 1 cup ice, cover, and shake until chilled. Step3: Strain into the chilled Collins glass. Top with club soda and garnish with lemon wedge.
ingredients: 2.5 cups ice, divided, 2 fluid ounces gin, 0.75 fluid ounce lemon juice, 0.5 fluid ounce simple syrup, 2 fluid ounces club soda, 1 lemon wedge

title: Budget Jungle Juice for a Crowd
description: This jungle juice recipe with vodka, rum, pink lemonade, and fruit juice makes a great alcoholic punch that will serve many on a limited budget.
directions: Step1: Pour orange drink, pink lemonade, pineapple-orange juice blend, vodka, rum, and fruit punch into a large punch bowl or container; stir well.
ingredients: 2 gallons orange-flavored drink, 4 quarts pink lemonade, 4 quarts pineapple and orange juice blend, 4 (750 milliliter) bottles vodka, 2 (750 milliliter) bottles white rum, 2 (46 fluid ounce) cans fruit punch

title: Blue Hawaiian Cocktail
description: The Blue Hawaiian is a classic tiki cocktail made with rum, cream of coconut, pineapple juice, and Curacao liqueur to create its signature blue color.
directions: Step1: Combine crushed ice, pineapple juice, rum, blue Curacao, and cream of coconut in a blender. Step2: Blend on high speed until smooth. Step3: Pour into a chilled highball glass. Garnish with a slice of pineapple and a maraschino cherry.
ingredients: 1 cup crushed ice, 2 fluid ounces pineapple juice, 1 fluid ounce light rum, 1 fluid ounce blue Curacao liqueur, 1 fluid ounce cream of coconut, 1 pineapple slice, 1 maraschino cherry

title: Sangria! Sangria!
description: This sangria recipe is easy to make with Spanish red wine, orange juice, brandy, and freshly chopped fruit for a super refreshing summer party drink.
directions: Step1: Gather all ingredients. Step2: Mix together red wine, brandy, triple sec, lemonade concentrate, orange juice, lemon juice, and sugar in a bowl. Add orange, lemon, and lime slices and maraschino cherries. Step3: Serve immediately over ice, or refrigerate 8 hours to overnight for best flavor. For a fizzy sangria, add club soda just before serving.
ingredients: 1 (750 milliliter) bottle dry red wine, 0.5 cup brandy, 0.5 cup triple sec, 0.33333334326744 cup frozen lemonade concentrate, 0.33333334326744 cup orange juice, 0.25 cup lemon juice, 0.25 cup white sugar, 1 medium orange, sliced into rounds, 1 medium lemon, sliced into rounds, 1 medium lime, sliced into rounds, 8 maraschino cherries, 2 cups carbonated water

title: Bahama Mama
description: Whip up this Bahama Mama cocktail made with two types of rum, orange and pineapple juice, and crushed ice for a refreshingly tropical adult drink.
directions: Step1: Combine crushed ice, orange juice, pineapple juice, regular rum, coconut-flavored rum, and grenadine in a blender. Blend until the drink's consistency is slushy.
ingredients: 1 cup crushed ice, 1 fluid ounce orange juice, 1 fluid ounce pineapple juice, 0.5 fluid ounce rum, 0.5 fluid ounce coconut-flavored rum, 0.5 fluid ounce grenadine syrup

title: Chocolate Cream Cold Brew
description: This cold brew coffee with chocolate cream foam is ready in under 5 minutes, and tastes just like the one the pros make.
directions: Step1: Add heavy whipping cream, milk, chocolate syrup, cocoa powder and vanilla into a tall glass. Whip with a milk frother until until desired consistency is reached. Step2: Serve over cold brew coffee.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons heavy whipping cream, 1 tablespoon milk, 1 1/2 teaspoons chocolate syrup (such as Torani® Sugar Free Syrup), 1 1/2 teaspoons cocoa powder, 1/2 tsp vanilla, cold brew coffee

title: Sparkling Cantaloupe Agua Fresca
description: This refreshing agua fresca with cantaloupe and lime juice is perfect on a hot day.
directions: Step1: Working in batches if needed, blend cantaloupe, water, lime juice, honey, and salt in a blender until smooth. Press through a sieve; discard solids. Add strained juice to a pitcher. Step2: Chill until ready to serve. Add club soda just before serving. Serve over ice, and garnish glasses with melon balls and lime zest twists.
ingredients: 2 pounds fresh cantaloupe cubes (6 cups), 2 cups water , 2 limes, juiced (6 tablespoons), 3 tablespoons Honey , 1/4 teaspoon salt, 2 cups club soda, chilled, Cantaloupe melon balls or cubes, for garnish , Lime zest twists, for garnish

title: Vodka Martini Cocktail
description: A vodka martini is a classic cocktail made with vodka and dry vermouth, served ice cold in a chilled martini glass, with green olives or a lemon twist.
directions: Step1: Gather ingredients. Step2: Combine vodka and dry vermouth in a cocktail mixing glass. Fill with ice and stir until chilled. Step3: Strain into a chilled martini glass. Step4: Garnish with three olives on a toothpick.
ingredients: 3 fluid ounces vodka, 1 fluid ounce dry vermouth, 1 cup ice cubes, 3 small olives

title: Cantaloupe Frenzy
description: A cantaloupe smoothie!! Perfect for those hot summer days or an after school snack to cool down with!
directions: Step1: Place cantaloupe cubes and ice into the container of a blender. Process until the ice is in small pieces. Add sugar, and puree. Pour into tall glasses and serve immediately.
ingredients: 1 cantaloupe - peeled, seeded and cubed, 3 tablespoons white sugar, or to taste, 2 cups ice cubes

title: Spiked Lemonade
description: Homemade lemonade spiked with coconut-flavored rum - the perfect tropical cooler on a hot day.
directions: Step1: Place sugar in warm water, stirring until sugar is completely dissolved. Add lemon juice, cold water, and coconut rum. Stir until completely incorporated. Step2: Fill 2 glasses with ice cubes and divide lemon juice mixture amongst both glasses.
ingredients: 0.5 cup freshly squeezed lemon juice, 0.25 cup warm water, 0.25 cup white sugar, 0.5 cup cold water, 3 (1.5 fluid ounce) jiggers coconut-flavored rum, ice cubes, as needed

title: Gluehwein
description: This glühwein recipe for hot spiced red wine is made with cinnamon, orange, and cloves for an easy, warming beverage that makes you feel cozy all over.
directions: Step1: Gather all ingredients. Step2: Combine water, sugar, and cinnamon stick in a saucepan; bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low. Step3: Cut one orange in half; squeeze orange halves over the sugar mixture to release their juice. Push 5 cloves into the outside of each orange peel; place peels into the simmering mixture. Continue to simmer over the lowest heat until thick and syrupy, 20 to 30 minutes. Step4: While the mixture is simmering, slice remaining orange and set aside for serving. Step5: When the mixture is finished simmering, stir in wine and heat until steaming but not simmering, 3 to 5 minutes. Discard orange peels and cinnamon stick. Step6: Ladle into mugs and garnish with orange slices.
ingredients: 0.75 cup water, 0.75 cup white sugar, 1 (3 inch) cinnamon stick, 2 medium oranges, divided, 10 whole cloves, 1 (750 milliliter) bottle red wine

title: Limoncello Moscow Mule
description: Add an Italian twist to traditional Moscow Mule by adding limoncello liqueur.
directions: Step1: Fill a copper mule mug with ice. Add lime juice, limoncello, and vodka; stir to combine. Top with ginger beer. Lightly stir again and garnish with lemon slice.
ingredients: 1 cup ice, 0.5 fluid ounce fresh lime juice, 1.5 fluid ounces limoncello liqueur, 1.5 fluid ounces vodka, 5 ounces ginger beer, 1 thin lemon slice (optional)

title: Hot Toddy
description: A hot toddy is a classic warm beverage made with whiskey and honey flavored with lemon, clove, cinnamon, and nutmeg for a cold weather pick-me-up.
directions: Step1: Pour boiling water, whiskey, and honey into a mug. Add cloves, cinnamon, and lemon slice. Let mixture stand for 5 minutes so flavors can mingle, then sprinkle with a pinch of nutmeg before serving.
ingredients: 2 fluid ounces boiling water, 1.5 fluid ounces whiskey, 1 teaspoon honey, 3 whole cloves, 1 cinnamon stick, 1 slice lemon, 1 pinch ground nutmeg

title: The Perfect Margarita
description: This margarita recipe uses fresh limes, white tequila, and high-quality triple sec. With the right ratios, you can easily make the perfect margarita!
directions: Step1: Gather all ingredients. Step2: Moisten the rim of a glass with a lime wedge. Sprinkle salt onto a plate. Lightly dip the moistened rim into the salt. Step3: Place a large ice cube in the glass and freeze the prepared glass until ready to serve. Step4: Fill a cocktail shaker with fresh ice. Add tequila, triple sec, and lime juice. Cover and shake vigorously until the outside of the shaker has frosted. Step5: Strain margarita into the chilled glass and garnish with a slice of lime.
ingredients: 1 wedge lime, 1 teaspoon coarse sea salt, or as needed, 1 large ice cube, 1 cup ice cubes, or as needed, 2 fluid ounces white tequila, 1.5 fluid ounces triple sec, 1 fluid ounce freshly squeezed lime juice, 1 slice lime

title: Chocolate Cake Shot
description: A chocolate cake shot made with hazelnut liqueur and vodka that magically tastes like chocolate cake when shot down with a sugared wedge of lemon.
directions: Step1: Combine hazelnut liqueur and vodka in a shot glass. Step2: Coat a wedge of lemon with sugar. Step3: Suck lemon wedge, then with juice still in your mouth, drink shot.
ingredients: 1 fluid ounce hazelnut liqueur, 0.5 fluid ounce vodka, 1 lemon, cut into wedges, 1 teaspoon white sugar, or to taste
